item.title: RT by @Volcanologist: That's not a #TourDeFrance2022, THIS is the Tour de France! Check out this animation of the tour that France (in pink) made over the planet in the last 600 million years! Thanks Andrew Merdith at >@SEELeeds for making this!
item.dc:creator: @geotdf
item.description: That's not a #TourDeFrance2022, THIS is the Tour de France! Check out this animation of the tour that France (in pink) made over the planet in the last 600 million years! Thanks Andrew Merdith at @SEELeeds for making this!

item.title:
RT by @Volcanologist: This study is being widely shared by national media and charities as evidence of a student MH crisis
But the data/methodology is not linked anywhere, and there‚Äôs no evidence of it on the website of the charity who ran it, and that's a problem
(thread)
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/newsbeat-61968952

item.title:
RT by @Volcanologist: I wasn‚Äôt originally gonna tell this story in a Twitter thread, but here goes. The NSF Office of Polar Programs & the US Antarctic Program have blatantly discriminatory‚Äîand illegal‚Äîpolicies in their PQ process.
They employ an abusive and discriminatory Dr at UTMB to enforce them.
item.dc:creator: @IceSheetMike
item.description:
I wasn‚Äôt originally gonna tell this story in a Twitter thread, but here goes. The NSF Office of Polar Programs & the US Antarctic Program have blatantly discriminatory‚Äîand illegal‚Äîpolicies in their PQ process.

They employ an abusive and discriminatory Dr at UTMB to enforce them.

item.title: RT by @Volcanologist: The news that BA Geography, + therefore the human, critical + social justice geography @SheffieldHallam is being cut with immediate effect is clearly political + a dangerous precedent. We all need to support our fellow geographers in defending human geography. Solidarity
item.dc:creator: @JennyPickerill
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @Volcanologist: Professor Dave Tappin has been studying tsunamis for 20 years, including the 2011 Japan tsunami and most recently, the Tonga eruption of January 2022.
Watch his recorded talk on the hazard of tsunamis on our YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=soy_6_MCU_w
item.dc:creator: @BritGeoSurvey
item.description:
Professor Dave Tappin has been studying tsunamis for 20 years, including the 2011 Japan tsunami and most recently, the Tonga eruption of January 2022.

Watch his recorded talk on the hazard of tsunamis on our YouTube:

invidious.fdn.fr/watch?v=soy_6_MC‚Ä¶

item.title: RT by @Volcanologist: Morning tweeps! Well over 300 people have now signed this letter supporting full inclusion of trans colleagues in the work of Advance HE & across academia. Please join us & make sure the voices of inclusion & respect are not drowned out by a loud, angry, transphobic minority.
item.dc:creator: @tigerinstemm
item.description:
Morning tweeps! Well over 300 people have now signed this letter supporting full inclusion of trans colleagues in the work of Advance HE & across academia. Please join us & make sure the voices of inclusion & respect are not drowned out by a loud, angry, transphobic minority.

nitter.42l.fr/tigerinstemm/status/1540295361855619073#m

item.title: RT by @Volcanologist: JOB ALERT! I am seeking a one-year postdoc who brings significant experience in LA-ICPMS, nominally starting Sept 1 2022. We are getting a brand new Resonetics laser and Agilent QQQ this summer in a brand new lab! If you are interested, DM/email me, or find me at Goldschmidt.
item.dc:creator: @EthanRockStory
item.description:
JOB ALERT!
I am seeking a one-year postdoc who brings significant experience in LA-ICPMS, nominally starting Sept 1 2022. We are getting a brand new Resonetics laser and Agilent QQQ this summer in a brand new lab! If you are interested, DM/email me, or find me at Goldschmidt.
